resources.string: This activity could interact with QR code and NFC tags only when it is on foreground

This activity could interact with QR code and NFC tags when it is on foreground as on background.
This mean that you could flash a QR code or NFC tag, outside from the application, and even if the application is not running, this activity will start.
You have to be very carefull when taking control over Qr Code and NFC tag on background.
With a wrong setup, you could take control over Qr Code and NFC tags that do not belong to your company.
Taking control in background over Qr Code and NFC tag that belongs to Connecthings or it partners is defined by the contract your company signed.
Check your contract before doing it.
Start simple test to get Content
Your phone does not support NFC
The application can\'t connect to backend. Check your connectivity.
There is no content associate to this point
The tag can\'t be read. Please try again.
The tag format is not supported.
To flash QR CODE the application needs to access to the camera.\nTry again to flash a QR CODE and accept the permission.
No content associate to this point
